title: Indulge your taste for luxury at IMT Boynton Beach! 1 Bed / 1 Bath!
posting_body: ['IMT Boynton Beach', 'Featured Floorplan: 1-bed / 1-bath / 765 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $2005', 'Deposit: Call', 'show contact info', 'Description:', '**Walk-ins welcome & choose from 3 tour options.', '**', "IMT Boynton Beach has the apartments for rent in Boynton Beach, FL that you've been searching for!", "You'll enjoy cooking in a gourmet kitchen with a frost-free refrigerator, dishwasher and a breakfast bar or a separate dining area.", 'Every room has nine-foot ceilings with fans.', 'Step out on the patio and enjoy beautiful lake views or snuggle up on the couch with your pet.', 'While you unwind, the in-home washer and dryer take care of those chores.', 'Give us a call to experience lakeside living, Palm Beach style!', 'Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property Today!', '<URL>', 'Lease Terms: 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pet Policy: Breed Restriction At IMT Boynton Beach, we know that the path to your heart is marked with paw prints and that the best part of your day is coming home to a wagging tail.', 'Pets are residents too!', '$300 pet fee, per pet.', '$25 monthly pet rent per pet.', 'No weight restrictions.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Two pet maximum.', 'Apartment Amenities:', '◾ Attached Garage\xa0with Private Entry in Select Homes', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Fully Equipped Kitchens', '◾ High Ceilings', '◾ Linen Closet', '◾ Microwave', '◾ Patio or\xa0Screened Balconies', '◾ Range w/Oven', '◾ Refrigerator', '◾ Vaulted Ceilings in Select Homes', 'Community Features:', '◾ Barbecue Area', '◾ Car\xa0Care\xa0Center', '◾ Clubhouse', '◾ Garages Available', '◾ IMT Pets Park', '◾ Playground', '◾ Pond', '◾ Sports Court', '◾ Sundeck', '◾ 24/7 Emergency Maintenance Service', '◾ 24-Hour Fitness Center', '◾ Kitchen Facilities', '◾ Onsite Management', '◾ Sand Volleyball Court', '◾ Two\xa0Resort-Style Pools', '◾ Two\xa0Tennis Courts', 'Call us:', 'show contact info', '220 Savannah Lakes Drive', 'Boynton Beach, FL 33436', 'Mon - Fri: 8:30 AM - 5:30 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '8CD7EA67A9244A52']
